Shadow Wing::

She took another shot to her injured wing and fluttered to the ground.
She transformed to bot mode and walked up to Unitron. She turned and 
yelled to the other Maximals. "HOLD YOUR FIRE! THEY HAVE A HOSTAGE!"
She turned and looked at Unitron.
"Have you no honor. Let him go and take me instead."
She couldn't believe she just said that.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Ramhorn/Unitron/Koga Shuko:
> 
> 
> Unitron, both laser rifles in hand, stopped next to Koga Shuko, 
putting a 
> laser rifle up against Ramhorn's neck, the other one firing off 
three bolts 
> at Shadow Wing.
> "Back off, or the Maxi is dead!  WE MEAN IT!"
